name: Symbiosis
description: Invoke the Rites of Moawita, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with healing abilities that can be used on allies.  Your Light Attacks heal for 1079.  Your Heavy Attacks heal for 958 every 1 second, and restore 1155 Magicka to you for successfully healing.  You heal yourself for 50% of the amount of healing done to the ally.
effectLines: You heal yourself for a percentage of the healing done to the ally.
coefDescription: Invoke the Rites of Moawita, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with healing abilities that can be used on allies.  Your Light Attacks heal for $1.  Your Heavy Attacks heal for $2 every 1 second, and restore 1155 Magicka to you for successfully healing.  You heal yourself for 50% of the amount of healing done to the ally.
rawDescription:
Invoke the Rites of Moawita, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with healing abilities that can be used on allies.

Your Light Attacks heal for <<1>>.

Your Heavy Attacks heal for <<2>> every <<3>>, and restore <<4>> Magicka to you for successfully healing.

You heal yourself for <<5>> of the amount of healing done to the ally.
